text: East Turkistan, Uyghuristan, and Uyghurstan (Uyghur: Sherqiy TÃ¼rkistan; Uyghuriye), refers to the eastern part of the greater Turkestan region of Central Asia. It has an area of 1,664,900 km2 and a population of 21,813,334 (2010 est). Category:East Turkestan independence movement
title: East Turkestan
